issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Alloy
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the Alloy here.

fields.description:
I am developing an application in titanium 3.2 to work in both IOS and Android. I am testing the application currently in Android 4.1 Note Tablet.
Sometimes there is problem in creating the android apk. It shows the error
[ERROR] :  Failed to run dexer:
[ERROR] Application Installer abnormal process termination. Process exit value was 1
 Even if I clean build the project, restart the windows, even kill any adb or node.exe, still I get the same error. If I leave my machine idle for sometime, then again it starts working.

comments.body: Can you please provide the complete error output from Studio window to diagnose this issue further? Let us know Studio and SDK version as well.
It is most likely a duplicate of TIMODOPEN-311 and related to ti.paint module. Can you please try Ti.paint 2.0.2 module as suggested in that ticket and let us know if it helps solve the issue?
Hi..I faced the same problem even in other projects which do not use any module or widget. So this problem is not related to Ti.paint module.
Please provide a simple project and complete environment information to reproduce this issue. We have tried several projects and we have not been able to reproduce this issue even a single time.

Hi All,

I install appcelerator studio in windows7.
When run the application on emulator I am getting same error.
Can any help out, how to resolve the issue.

*Environments in windows os:*

Operating System  = Microsoft Windows 7 Ultimate
	Node.js           = 0.10.13
	npm Version       = 1.3.2
	Titanium CLI      = 4.0.1
	Appcelerator Studio   = 4.1.1
	Titanium SDK      = 4.1.0.GA
	java 			  = jdk1.8.0_51
